line_1: I hear the hollowing Elves, and Midnight Shriek
line_2: Of wandring Ghosts, who now unbodied seek

line_1: When wakes the sudden bitter shriek,
line_2: And redder swells thy little cheek;

line_1: Where fiends nightly revel, and guilty ghosts shriek,
line_2: The fugitive dares in these chambers to seek,

line_1: How would our tender British beauties shriek,
line_2: To see slim beaux on bulls their lances break!

line_1: Groans, and the shrill screech-owl's shriek.
line_2: Then thro' the gloom alternate break
